Value.label: Over current protection
Value.Help: Output Load will be turned off automatically after 30 seconds and if the current overrun 1.5A.

Value.label: Over heat protection
Value.Help: Output load will be closed after 30 seconds if the temperature inside the product exceeds 100C.

Value.label: Status re-power on
Value.Help: Configure the output load status after re-power on

Item.label: The last status before the power outage

Value.label: WallSwipe IR sensor
Value.Help: Enable/disable the IR sensor of WallSwipe. (LSB) Value 1. Value 1 = 0, disable the IR Sensor. Value 1 = 1, enable the IR Sensor. Value 2 = 0, Wave Option 1 is selected. Value 2 = 1, Wave Option 2 is selected. Value 3 = 0, disable the scene control functionality for Left/Right wave. Value 3 = 1, enable the scene control functionality for Left/Right wave Value 4 = 0, disable the scene control functionality for all wave actions. Value 4 = 1, enable the scene control functionality for all wave actions.

Value.label: WallSwipe button color
Value.Help: Set the button color of WallSwipe. Value 1= Level. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe LED Up gesture action
Value.Help: Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is UP. Value 1= Reserved. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe LED Down gesture action
Value.Help: Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Down. Value 1= Level. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe LED Left gesture action
Value.Help: Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Left. Value 1= Level. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe LED Right gesture action
Value.Help: Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Right. Value 1= Level. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe Night light
Value.Help: Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when it is in Night light state. Value 1= Level. Value 2= the color value of Red. Value 3= the color value of Green. Value 4= the color value of Blue.

Value.label: WallSwipe sensitivity
Value.Help: Set the sensitivity of WallSwipe.

Value.label: Notification report association group 1
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1 when the state of output load is changed

Item.label: Send Hail CC when using the manual switch to change the load state

Value.label: Notification report using the external switch 1
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 3 when using the external switch 1 to switch the loads

Value.label: Notification report using the external switch 2
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 4 when using the external switch 2 to switch the loads

Value.label: LED status
Value.Help: Configure the state of LED when it is in 3 modes below

Item.label: The LED will follow the status
LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load but the LED will turn off after 5 seconds

Value.label: Time set for Night light mode
Value.Help: Value1: Hour of ON. Value2: Minute of ON. Value3: Hour of OFF. Value4: Minute of OFF. E.g. The default setting is the Night light mode is enabled at 12: 00 and disabled at 8:00 0x12000800.

Value.label: State appointment 1
Value.Help: State appointment Set the ON time of output load. Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun). Value2 = ON (hour) Value3 = ON (minute) Value4 = ON (brightness level)

Value.label: State appointment 2
Value.Help: State appointment Set the ON time of output load. Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun). Value2 = ON (hour) Value3 = ON (minute) Value4 = ON (brightness level)

Value.label: Enable/disable the parameter 91 and 92
Value.Help: Enables/disables parameter 91 and 92

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Set the external switch mode for S1
Value.Help: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

Value.label: Set the external switch mode for S2
Value.Help: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

Value.label: WallSwipe
Value.Help: Get the state of touch panel port

Value.label: Control destination for external switch S1
Value.Help: Set the control destination for external switch S1

Item.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

Value.label: Control destination for external switch S2
Value.Help: Set the control destination for external switch S2

Item.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

Value.label: Default dimming rate
Value.Help: Set the default dimming rate

Value.label: Current working mode
Value.Help: Get the current working mode

Value.label: Dimming principle
Value.Help: Set the dimming principle

Value.label: Type of load
Value.Help: To get what type of load the Dimmer is connected to

Value.label: Min brightness level
Value.Help: Set the min brightness level that the load can reach to

Value.label: Max brightness level
Value.Help: Set the max brightness level that the load can reach to

Value.label: Working way for S1/S2
Value.Help: Set the working way for S1/S2 when the Switch mode is 2 state switch mode. Bit 0 =0, S1 is a toggle switch. Bit 0 =1, S1 is an On/Off switch, the out load state and S1 switch state would be in sync when using S1 to control the output load. Bit 1 =0, S2 is a toggle switch. Bit 1 =1, S2 is an On/Off switch, the out load state and S2 switch state would be in sync when using S2 to control the output load. Bit 2- Bit 7, reserved.

Value.label: Function of S1/S2
Value.Help: Set the function of S1/S2. Bit 0 = 0, the function of sending NIF is disabled. Bit 0 = 1, the function of sending NIF is enabled. Bit 1 = 0, the function of entering RF power level test mode is disabled. Bit 1 = 1, the function of entering RF power level test mode is enabled. Bit 2 = 0, the function of factory reset is disabled. Bit 2 = 1, the function of factory reset is enabled. Bit 3- Bit 6 = reserved. Bit 7 = 0, the setting for Bit 0 -Bit 2 are ineffective. Bit 7 = 1, the setting for Bit 0 -Bit 2 are effective.

Value.label: Recognition way of load
Value.Help: Set the recognition way of load

Item.label: Never recognize the load when power on
Only recognize once when first power on
Recognize the load once power on

Value.label: Configuration Locked
Value.Help: Enable/disable Configuration Locked

Value.label: Reset To Factory Defaults
Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
